custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT NA_PROJ_MASTER_SID, PRICE_TYPE, BASELINE_METHODOLOGY, FORECAST_METHODOLOGY, GROWTH_RATE, START_PERIOD, END_PERIOD, BASELINE_PERIOD, ROLLING_PERIOD, FREQUENCY, PRICE_BASIS FROM ST_NATIONAL_ASSUMPTIONS WHERE
SELECT NDC9, WAC_PRICE,BASE_YEAR_AMP, BASE_YEAR_CPI,FORECAST_AMP, FORECAST_BESTPRICE FROM ST_MEDICAID_NEW_NDC WHERE
SELECT SFN.ITEM_MASTER_SID,IM.ITEM_NO, SFN.WAC_PRICE,SFN.NON_FAMP,SFN.FSS FROM ST_FEDERAL_NEW_NDC SFN JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID = SFN.ITEM_MASTER_SID WHERE

SELECT IM.NDC9, ITEM_DESC=CASE WHEN Count(DISTINCT im.ITEM_MASTER_SID) > 1 THEN 'MULTIPLE' ELSE (SELECT TOP 1 ITEM_DESC FROM ITEM_MASTER I WHERE IM.NDC9 = I.NDC9) END
FROM ITEM_MASTER IM WHERE IM.NDC9 ='?NDC9' GROUP BY IM.NDC9, IM.ITEM_DESC
SELECT IM.ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM_MASTER IM WHERE IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID ='?IMID'

DECLARE @NA_PROJ_MASTER_SID INT=?PID
SELECT NPD.ITEM_MASTER_SID FROM NA_PROJ_DETAILS NPD LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_PRICING IP ON NPD.ITEM_MASTER_SID = IP.ITEM_MASTER_SID LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER IPQ ON IP.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID AND IPQ.PRICING_QUALIFIER IN ('AMP', 'BP', 'QNON-FAMP', 'QFSS' ) WHERE NPD.NA_PROJ_MASTER_SID = @NA_PROJ_MASTER_SID GROUP BY NPD.ITEM_MASTER_SID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT IPQ.PRICING_QUALIFIER) <> 4

DECLARE @NA_PROJ_MASTER_SID INT=?PID, @USER_ID INT=?UID, @SESSION_ID INT=?SID
UPDATE IM SET IM.ALT_BASELINE_AMP = A.ALT_BASELINE_AMP, IM.ALT_BASE_CPI = A.ALT_BASE_CPI FROM ITEM_MASTER IM INNER JOIN (SELECT Min(CASE WHEN PRICE_TYPE = 'AMP' THEN ALT_BASE_YEAR END) ALT_BASELINE_AMP, Min(CASE WHEN PRICE_TYPE = 'CPI-U' THEN ALT_BASE_YEAR END) ALT_BASE_CPI, IM.NDC9 FROM ITEM_MASTER IM INNER JOIN NA_PROJ_DETAILS NPD ON NPD.ITEM_MASTER_SID = IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID INNER JOIN ST_MEDICAID_URA_ACTUALS MA ON MA.NA_PROJ_DETAILS_SID = NPD.NA_PROJ_DETAILS_SID WHERE NA_PROJ_MASTER_SID = @NA_PROJ_MASTER_SID AND USER_ID = @USER_ID AND SESSION_ID = @SESSION_ID AND MA.PRICE_TYPE IN ( 'CPI-U', 'AMP' ) GROUP BY IM.NDC9)A ON IM.NDC9 = A.NDC9
